module.title: Info: Workshops
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>workshops`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>workshops` ( `workshopId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `rank` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '3', `title` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `abstract` text NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `imageAlignH` tinyint(3) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `imageAlignV` tinyint(3) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`workshopId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `rank` (`rank`), KEY `createdAt` (`createdAt`), KEY `modifiedAt` (`modifiedAt`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
